All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Actor
Class derived from Intersecting Object and also acts as a base class for several other classes
Animal
Defines the behaviour of the frog which is controlled by the player
AnimatedObject
New class derived from Actor class
AudioController
New class that allows us to set different audio at different points in the game.
BackgroundImage
Called in MenuController and GameView class to set background image
ButtonView
New class to set the style for the buttons in main menu.
End
Derived from IntersectingObject.
EndController
New class that allows us to set the ends using IntersectingObject.
GameController
New class that allows us to set the animation of the models.
GameView
New class that extends Pane and uses constructor to set the game views.
Insect
New class derived from IntersectingObject to set an insect as a bonus for the frog.
IntersectingObject
Derived from ImageView class and is a base class to Actor and AnimatedObject
LabelView
New class that extends Label.
Level
New class that creates arrays of type Actor for the different levels.
LevelController
New class that allows us to maintain the levels.
LevelView
New class that extends Pane.
LivesController
New class that creates a static instance of LivesView to generate images representing lives of frog.
LivesView
New class that extends Pane.
Log
Derived from Actor class
Main
Main Class extends Application.
MenuController
New class that allows us to set the elements of frogger menu.
Obstacle
Derived from Actor class.
SafeCrocodile
New class representing a safe crocodile that can be used as a ride for the frog to cross the river.
ScoreBoardInput
New class that allows us to implement compareTo method.
ScoreController
New class that uses ScoreModel to implement read method.
ScoreModel
New class that uses ScoreBoardInput to create an arrayList.
ScoreView
New class that extends Pane.
Snake
New class representing a snake that appears on the median depending on game levels.
SubSceneView
New class that extends SubScene.
TimeController
New class that creates an instance of TimeView class.
TimeView
New class that extends Pane.
Turtle
Class representing a safe turtle.
UnsafeCrocodile
New class derived from SafeCrocodile.
WetTurtle
Derived from Turtle class.
